title: Drawing, Priam in the Tent of Achilles, ca. 1790
title_raw: Priam in the Tent of Achilles
medium: Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on light blue paper
markings: Watermark: 3992 Below oval: A C F
inscribed: Inscribed: Priamo prega Achille per il corpo dettore
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Priam shown kneeling before Achilles who sits at right. He is followed by Idaeus carrying ransom, female companions of Achilles sit or stand by table in middle plane.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Priam in the Tent of Achilles, ca. 1790. Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on light blue paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3293
